entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:04PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Near Freezing Temperatures Tonight... As skies clear this afternoon and evening, cold temperatures will develop tonight. entry.summary: ...Thunderstorms Ending This Evening; Windy and Dry Wednesday... .While a few isolated thunderstorms will be possible across Lake County through late this evening, thunderstorms and associated lightning will come to an end by midnight.
